  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GObserver, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DesktopView
extends javax.swing.JDesktopPane
implements GObserver
    Desktop area of the application.
    Author:
    Nikola Jovanovic

        private void updateSelection(java.lang.Object[] path,
                             int idx)

        Parameters:
        path - array of nodes that represents the current tree selection
        idx - the index in the path array this view is interested in
